ourMenu.title: Buttermilk Pancakes

ourMenu.desc: This popular beverage showcases how to entice children to drink milk in a creative way.Chocolate and malt powder that is mixed with milk to make.

ourMenu.title: Oreo Dream
ourMenu.desc: Blend chocolate sandwich cookies, ice cream, and milk together in a blender until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.

ourMenu.title: Homemade Biscuit
ourMenu.desc: These biscuits are light, fluffy, super buttery. They're perfect with any time meal, we guarantee that that you'll order another one.

ourMenu.title: Milkshake for Couples
ourMenu.desc: We offer a variety of milkshake flavors to treat every sweet tooth,including Vanilla,Strawberry and many seasonal flavors.To see what is currently on the menu.

ourMenu.title: Bison Steak
ourMenu.desc: Beef lovers will enjoy this tender cut cooked on the grill or pan seared with herb butter.Bison is a great red meat with more protein,less cholesterol, and fat.
